 3551:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:restart_child(Sup1, child1),
 3552:     link(ChildPid2),
 3553:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3554:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3555:     ok.
 3556: 
 3557: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from any_significant to all_significant.
 3558: significant_upgrade_any_all(_Config) ->
 3559:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3560:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3561: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3562: 	       restart => transient,
 3563: 	       significant => true},
 3564:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3565: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3566: 	       restart => transient,
 3567: 	       significant => true},
 3568:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3569:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3570:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3571:     link(ChildPid1),
 3572:     link(ChildPid2),
 3573:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3574:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3575:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3576:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3577:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3578:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3579:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3580:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3581:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1]),
 3582:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3583:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3584:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3585:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3586:     ok.
 3587: 
 3588: % Test upgrading auto-shutdown from all_significant to any_significant.
 3589: significant_upgrade_all_any(_Config) ->
 3590:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3591:     Child1 = #{id => child1,
 3592: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3593: 	       restart => transient,
 3594: 	       significant => true},
 3595:     Child2 = #{id => child2,
 3596: 	       start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3597: 	       restart => transient,
 3598: 	       significant => true},
 3599:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => all_significant}, []}}),
 3600:     {ok, ChildPid1} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child1),
 3601:     {ok, ChildPid2} = supervisor:start_child(Sup1, Child2),
 3602:     link(ChildPid1),
 3603:     link(ChildPid2),
 3604:     S1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3605:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, []}}),
 3606:     S2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3607:     true = (S1 /= S2),
 3608:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3609:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3610:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3611:     terminate(ChildPid1, normal),
 3612:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, ChildPid2, Sup1]),
 3613:     ok.
 3614: 
 3615: % Test upgrading a child from non-significant to significant
 3616: % and vice versa.
 3617: significant_upgrade_child(_Config) ->
 3618:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3619:     Child1 = #{id => child,
 3620: 	      start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3621: 	      restart => transient,
 3622: 	      significant => false},
 3623:     Child2 = #{id => child,
 3624: 	      start => {supervisor_1, start_child, []},
 3625: 	      restart => transient,
 3626: 	      significant => true},
 3627: 
 3628:     % A supervisor with auto-shutdown set to never should not allow upgrading
 3629:     % a non-significant child to significant.
 3630:     {ok, Sup1} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [Child1]}}),
 3631:     [{child, ChildPid1, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup1),
 3632:     link(ChildPid1),
 3633:     S1_1 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3634:     {error, _} = fake_upgrade(Sup1, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => never}, [Child2]}}),
 3635:     S1_2 = sys:get_state(Sup1),
 3636:     true = (S1_1 /= S1_2),
 3637:     error = check_exit([ChildPid1], 1000),
 3638:     error = check_exit([Sup1], 1000),
 3639:     terminate(Sup1, shutdown),
 3640:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid1, Sup1]),
 3641: 
 3642:     % Start with a non-significant child, upgrade it to significant
 3643:     % and ensure that it triggers auto-shutdown.
 3644:     {ok, Sup2} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child1]}}),
 3645:     [{child, ChildPid2, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup2),
 3646:     link(ChildPid2),
 3647:     S2_1 = sys:get_state(Sup2),
 3648:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup2, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child2]}}),
 3649:     S2_2 = sys:get_state(Sup2),
 3650:     true = (S2_1 /= S2_2),
 3651:     error = check_exit([ChildPid2], 1000),
 3652:     error = check_exit([Sup2], 1000),
 3653:     terminate(ChildPid2, normal),
 3654:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid2, Sup2]),
 3655: 
 3656:     % Start with a significant child, upgrade it to non-significant
 3657:     % and ensure that it does not trigger auto-shutdown.
 3658:     {ok, Sup3} = start_link({ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child2]}}),
 3659:     [{child, ChildPid3, _, _}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup3),
 3660:     link(ChildPid3),
 3661:     S3_1 = sys:get_state(Sup3),
 3662:     ok = fake_upgrade(Sup3, {ok, {#{auto_shutdown => any_significant}, [Child1]}}),
 3663:     S3_2 = sys:get_state(Sup3),
 3664:     true = (S3_1 /= S3_2),
 3665:     error = check_exit([ChildPid3], 1000),
 3666:     error = check_exit([Sup3], 1000),
 3667:     terminate(ChildPid3, normal),
 3668:     ok = check_exit([ChildPid3]),
 3669:     error = check_exit([Sup3], 1000),
 3670:     terminate(Sup3, shutdown),
 3671:     ok = check_exit([Sup3]),
 3672: 
 3673:     ok.
 3674: 
 3675: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 3676: terminate(Pid, Reason) when Reason =/= supervisor ->
 3677:     terminate(dummy, Pid, dummy, Reason).
 3678: 
 3679: terminate(Sup, _, ChildId, supervisor) ->
 3680:     ok = supervisor:terminate_child(Sup, ChildId);
 3681: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, kill) ->
 3682:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3683:     exit(ChildPid, kill),
 3684:     receive
 3685: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, killed} ->
 3686: 	    ok
 3687:     end;
 3688: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, shutdown) ->
 3689:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3690:     exit(ChildPid, shutdown),
 3691:     receive
 3692: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, shutdown} ->
 3693: 	    ok
 3694:     end;
 3695: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, {shutdown, Term}) ->
 3696:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3697:     exit(ChildPid, {shutdown, Term}),
 3698:     receive
 3699: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, {shutdown, Term}} ->
 3700: 	    ok
 3701:     end;
 3702: terminate(_, ChildPid, _, normal) ->
 3703:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3704:     ChildPid ! stop,
 3705:     receive
 3706: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, normal} ->
 3707: 	    ok
 3708:     end;
 3709: terminate(_, ChildPid, _,abnormal) ->
 3710:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, ChildPid),
 3711:     ChildPid ! die,
 3712:     receive
 3713: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, ChildPid, died} ->
 3714: 	    ok
 3715:     end.
 3716: 
 3717: in_child_list([], _) ->
 3718:     true;
 3719: in_child_list([Pid | Rest], Pids) ->
 3720:     case is_in_child_list(Pid, Pids) of
 3721: 	true ->
 3722: 	    in_child_list(Rest, Pids);
 3723: 	false ->
 3724: 	    ct:fail(child_should_be_alive)
 3725:     end.
 3726: not_in_child_list([], _) ->
 3727:     true;
 3728: not_in_child_list([Pid | Rest], Pids) ->
 3729:     case is_in_child_list(Pid, Pids) of
 3730: 	true ->
 3731: 	    ct:fail(child_should_not_be_alive);
 3732: 	false ->
 3733: 	    not_in_child_list(Rest, Pids)
 3734:     end.
 3735: 
 3736: is_in_child_list(Pid, ChildPids) ->
 3737:     lists:member(Pid, ChildPids).
 3738: 
 3739: check_exit(Pids) ->
 3740:     check_exit(Pids, infinity).
 3741: 
 3742: check_exit([], _Timeout) ->
 3743:     ok;
 3744: check_exit([Pid | Pids], Timeout) ->
 3745:     receive
 3746: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _} ->
 3747: 	    check_exit(Pids, Timeout)
 3748:     after Timeout ->
 3749: 	error
 3750:     end.
 3751: 
 3752: check_exit_reason(Reason) ->
 3753:     receive
 3754: 	{'EXIT', _, Reason} ->
 3755: 	    ok;
 3756: 	{'EXIT', _, Else} ->
 3757: 	    ct:fail({bad_exit_reason, Else})
 3758:     end.
 3759: 
 3760: check_exit_reason(Pid, Reason) ->
 3761:     receive
 3762: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
 3763: 	    ok;
 3764: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Else} ->
 3765: 	    ct:fail({bad_exit_reason, Else})
 3766:     end.
